overview.name: Overview
overview.title: PostHog helps {companyName} make better product decisions.
overview.description: Understand user behavior, validate assumptions, and measure the impact of every feature. All the product analytics tools you need in one platform.

product_analytics.title: Deep user insights
product_analytics.description: Track user journeys, analyze funnels, and understand retention. Get answers to your product questions without writing SQL or waiting for analysts.

experiments.title: Validate with A/B tests
experiments.description: Test your hypotheses with real users. Run experiments on features, copy, and flows. Statistical significance calculated automatically.

surveys.title: Get qualitative feedback
surveys.description: Ask users directly what they think. Target surveys to specific segments, measure NPS, and collect feature requests.

session_replay.title: See the user experience
session_replay.description: Watch how real users interact with your product. Identify UX issues, understand drop-offs, and build empathy with your users.

feature_flags.title: Control feature rollouts
feature_flags.description: Launch features to specific user segments. Get early feedback, iterate quickly, and roll back instantly if needed.

insights.name: Insights
insights.title: Answer any product question
insights.description: Flexible analytics that adapt to your needs. Build custom dashboards, share insights with stakeholders, and make data-driven decisions.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Start free, scale as you grow
pricing.description: Generous free tier with no time limit. Usage-based pricing means you only pay for what you use. No per-seat charges.

cta.name: Get Started
cta.title: Ready to understand your users better?
cta.description: Start using PostHog today or book a demo to learn more.
